oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Canadian Science Education Academic Genealogy (May 2014)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Wiseman, D.
Pegg, J. M.
Hostetler, A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This image presents an academic genealogy of Canadian Science Education Researchers in Canada. Key for Individuals: - Current Canadian Science Education Researchers (Orange) - Supervisors that have been identified as Canadian Education Researchers in other disciplines (Blue) - Supervisors for which the discipline is unknown (Grey) *Colors of the lines indicate the geographic location of the supervisor.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Science Education; Academic Genealogy
